mapper.select: SELECT free_num, free_subject, free_title, mem_id, free_hit, DATE_FORMAT(free_created_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS free_created_date FROM free_board WHERE free_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY free_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board ( free_title, free_cont, free_created_date, mem_id, free_subject ) VALUES ( #{freeTitle}, #{freeCont}, NOW(), 'admin', 'sub' )
mapper.select: SELECT free_num, free_title, free_cont, free_hit, DATE_FORMAT(free_created_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS free_created_date, mem_id, free_subject FROM free_board WHERE free_num = #{freeNum} AND free_deleted = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE free_board SET free_hit = free_hit + 1 WHERE free_num = #{freeNum}

UPDATE free_board SET deleted_yn = 'Y', free_updated_date = Now(), mem_id = 'admin' WHERE free_num = #{freeNum}
